Who are the other opposition activists jailed in Russia?Alexei Navalny, Russia's most prominent opposition leader, died on Friday after collapsing at the penal colony where he was serving a long jail term, prison officials said. Following is a list of some other opposition activists jailed in Russia. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 18:23:50 GMT WQICOWIMNZJFJIAH6HDFYEHGCM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/who-are-other-opposition-activists-jailed-Russia-2024-02-16/Lucy Papachristou世界欧洲
Hundreds gather across Europe to mourn Navalny, denounce PutinHundreds of protesters gathered in European cities on Friday to express their outrage over the death of Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny, chanting slogans critical of Russian President Vladimir Putin whom many blame for the activist's death. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 18:17:04 GMT EBG7SHIRFVIWDHGOHPB7WTYJCY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hundreds-gather-across-europe-mourn-navalny-denounce-putin-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Russia labels businessman Tinkov as 'foreign agent'Russia's Justice Ministry has designated entrepreneur Oleg Tinkov a "foreign agent," the ministry said on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 18:15:53 GMT XFBPIQVLFJIQHD7MMZGRTBLXG4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-labels-businessman-tinkov-foreign-agent-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Biden says he pushed Netanyahu for temporary ceasefireU.S. President Joe Biden said Friday he has had extensive talks with Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in recent days in which he pushed for a temporary ceasefire. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 18:11:05 GMT DMHB4EOCHNIGPCM2RYJHGBQGHA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/biden-says-pushed-netanyahu-temporary-ceasefire-2024-02-16/Reuters世界中东
Biden says 'Putin and his thugs' caused Navalny's deathU.S. President Joe Biden on Friday blamed Russian President Vladimir Putin for Alexei Navalny's death and warned there could be consequences, saying he was "not surprised" but "outraged" by the opposition leader's passing. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 17:09:13 GMT T2ZGP6WYB5LCTCPFG7O4U2GJAI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/biden-speak-noon-navalnys-death-white-house-says-2024-02-16/Steve Holland, Trevor Hunnicutt世界美国
ICJ holds hearings on Israel's occupation of Palestinian territoriesA record 52 states will present arguments about the legal consequences of Israel's occupation of the Palestinian territories at the International Court of Justice (ICJ), the U.N.'s highest legal body. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 17:07:20 GMT I4QFANL45VO3VOBFDO5UFWMKVE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/world-court-holds-hearings-israels-ocupation-palestinian-territories-2024-02-16/Stephanie Van Den Berg世界中东
EU to 'spare no effort' to hold Russia accountable for Navalny's death, commission saysThe EU will do whatever it can to hold Russia accountable for the death of opposition leader Alexei Navalny, EU Commission President Ursula von der Leyen and Vice President Josep Borrell said on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 16:59:20 GMT OX5SJWU6MFIN3O2RRX3ZBTBIXM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-spare-no-effort-hold-Russia-accountable-navalnys-death-commission-says-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Egypt aborts controversial pyramid renovation planEgypt has scuttled a controversial plan to reinstall ancient granite cladding on the pyramid of Menkaure, the smallest of the three great pyramids of Giza, a committee formed by the country's tourism minister said in a statement. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 16:47:33 GMT 2VC2CTZA6VJ57M5FVCHCAX7H7M https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/egypt-aborts-controversial-pyramid-renovation-plan-2024-02-16/Patrick Werr世界非洲
Kremlin: No contact from US about Moscow's nuclear capability in space -TASSThe United States has not contacted Russia since rumours about Russia's new nuclear capabilities in space surfaced, but Moscow is ready to work with Washington on developing anti-satellite weapons, TASS cited the Kremlin's spokesman as saying on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 16:46:52 GMT OFH3RNEBU5IIHHLYDN3VUTRRTA https://www.reuters.com/world/kremlin-no-contact-us-about-moscows-nuclear-capability-space-tass-2024-02-16/Reuters世界
Cuba struggles to shore up subsidized milk supply for childrenCuba is struggling to secure enough milk for children, a minister said, in the latest shortage putting strain on a decades-old subsidies scheme created by the late Fidel Castro. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 16:24:44 GMT N6SRZ3YWOJIGHLLLBYS526MBAQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/cuba-struggles-shore-up-subsidized-milk-supply-children-2024-02-16/Reuters世界美洲
Ivory Coast seizes 100 tons of cocoa at the border with GuineaIvory Coast's Coffee and Cocoa Council (CCC) has helped the national police to seize three trucks loaded with 1,500 bags of cocoa beans on the border with Guinea, the regulator's managing director said on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 15:56:27 GMT MAAUQCC6BNLT7O2R2JMFJOFS4U https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ivory-coast-seizes-100-tons-cocoa-border-with-guinea-2024-02-16/Reuters世界非洲
